description: Try this family-friendly salad recipe of beautiful crispy-skinned barramundi, crunchy cabbage and sweet potato ribbons topped with homemade tartare sauce.
name: Fish & Chips Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 sprig continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place sweet potato, in a single layer, on 1 tray. Season with pepper. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, to make the healthier tartare sauce, combine all the ingredients in a small bowl. Season with pepper.

Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Pat fish skin dry with paper towels. Season all over with pepper. Cook fish, skin-side down, for 3 minutes on each side or until skin is golden and crisp, and fish is cooked through.
Arrange spinach, cabbage and sweet potato in a large bowl. Top with fish and dollop with sauce. Scatter over parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
